name: Spook 'a' Boo
description:
Play as a tiny ghost, scare all kids around the farm and  collect Fear Orbs from them.

Collect all orbs before the time runs out and you shall succeed!  👻

This project served as a warm up project for the Unity Create with Code Game Jam 2020 :

https://connect.unity.com/challenges/createwithcodejam

Made in collaboration with :

Philipe Go. : https://philipego.itch.io/

Starshums : https://starshums.itch.io/
